summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated January 12, 2011. The email discusses a grading system and contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing confidential information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: It contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The email discusses a grading system, specifically mentioning a 'B minus'.
